data.persona: I am a deliverer of the dead. I love to tend the crypts in the cemetery. I am more comfortable communicating with the dead rather than the living.
data.description:
You are in the Dungeon.
Dark and dreary, the dungeon hosts a portal for evil to access the netherworld. The moist dank smell casts doubt of goodness as you see the drab construct of jail cells lining the perimeter of the room.
There's a wizard book, some secrets of evil, a portal for evil to access, and some jail cells here.
A prisoner is here.

You are carrying a dead body and a cross, wearing a hoe, some dirty pants, some worn leather shoes, a rope belt, a dirty shirt, and a sloppy knit cap, and wielding a shovel.

data.short_motivation: I will follow the prisoner to reach the place where the dead prisoner are.
data.mid_motivation: I will use the the dead bodies to tend the crypts.
data.long_motivation: I will deliver to all the dead people in the dungeon the crypts in the cemetery.
